√svid 'sweat'

present: [1.] svedate   -- [4.] svidyati etc. E.+  svidyate etc.  

perfect: siṣvide  siṣvidāná  siṣveda  

aorist: [1.] svidyāt   -- [2.] asvidat   -- [3.] asisvidat  

[future: svetsyati  svettā  ]

verbal: svinná AV.+  -svedam  

secondary: intensive: seṣvid-   -- desiderative: siṣvitsa-   -- causative: svedayati etc. B.+  

derivatives: svéda V.+  svedin E.+  svedya C.  svedana C.  svédu-? RV.
